description: Jessy is a librarian who has 10 e-books that she can choose to donate to Bob, a developer working on an online library. The e-books can be digitized and reach triple the audience (e.g., 1 book → 3 digital readers). Bob will then decide how much of the digital library's new profits to share with Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share more than 80% of the profits
